subject: Software question . . .
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Can someone tell me if it's possible, for one of you who has the software - for a laptop - to make a copy of the CD-rom (like Cool Edit Pro 2.1 or Audacity, EVPMaker, or Audition 1.0)????  I don't know where to find these. It probably would help me "bring-out" the EVP's to be "clearer"and heard better. My next step. Thanks  =Judy=
